code: import React from'react';import{CurrentUserContext}from'../contexts/CurrentUserContext';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Card(props){var currentUser=React.useContext(CurrentUserContext);var isOwn=props.card.owner._id===currentUser._id;var isLiked=props.card.likes.some(function(i){return i._id===currentUser._id;});var cardLikeButtonClassName="like__button ".concat(isLiked?'like__button_active':'');var cardDeleteButtonClassName="element__trash-btn ".concat(isOwn?'element__trash-btn_visible':'element__trash-btn_hidden');function handleCardClick(){props.onCardClick(props.card);}function handleLikeClick(){props.onCardLike(props.card);}function handleDeleteClick(){props.onCardDelete(props.card);}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("article",{className:"element",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"element__image",onClick:handleCardClick,alt:props.card.name,src:props.card.link}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:cardDeleteButtonClassName,onClick:handleDeleteClick,type:"button","aria-label":"\u0423\u0434\u0430\u043B\u0438\u0442\u044C"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"element__block",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"element__title",children:props.card.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"like",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:cardLikeButtonClassName,onClick:handleLikeClick,type:"button","aria-label":"\u041D\u0440\u0430\u0432\u0438\u0442\u0441\u044F"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"like__counter",children:props.card.likes.length})]})]})]})});}export default Card;
